    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • makeParallel

        private <T,R> R makeParallel(int threadsCnt,
                             java.util.List<? extends T> list,
                             java.util.function.Function<java.util.List<? extends T>,R> function,
                             java.util.function.Function<java.util.List<R>,R> merge)
                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Performs given function parallel on a list.

        Divides list on parts using makePartitions(List, int). If mapper is set, will use it to perform function else creates threads and performs given function in them on each part. Finally combines the result with merge function.

        Type Parameters:
        T - type of elements in List
        R - result type
        Parameters:
        threadsCnt - number of threads that can be used
        list - List on which function must be performed
        function - function to perform
        merge - function to combine result
        Returns:
        result of the function on each part of list combined by merge
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if any worker thread was interrupted

      • makePartitions

        private <T> java.util.List<java.util.List<? extends T>> makePartitions(java.util.List<? extends T> list,
                                                                       int parts)
        Splits given list on given number of parts
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of elements in list
        Parameters:
        list - list to split
        parts - number of parts
        Returns:
        List of parts of given list

        public java.lang.String concat(int threads,
                               java.util.List<?> list)
                        throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Returns concatenated String representations of all elements in given list

        Uses makeParallel(int, List, Function, Function) to perform whole task parallel

        list - List of elements

        Throws:

                                   java.util.List<? extends T> list,
                                   java.util.function.Function<? super T,? extends U> function)
                            throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Applies given function on a list.

        Returns another list where each element is result of function applied to element in initial list

        Uses makeParallel(int, List, Function, Function) to perform whole task parallel
